Talk at WorkNano 2019

Publicado em 19 Feb 2019

Talk on materials modelling at WorkNano.

We presented at WorkNano 2019 a talk on modelling and simulations applied to materials. The event gathered researchers to discuss the state of the art in computational tools and applications.
